verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6680>Command<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H7133>them<s%>, My offering, and my <S%H3899>bread<s%> for my sacrifices made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto <S%H8104>me<s%>, shall you observe to <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto me in their due <S%H4150>season<s%>.

And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H801>them<s%>, This is the offering made by fire which you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot<s%> day by <S%H3117>day<s%>, for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.
The <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>;

And a <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3795>beaten<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.

It is a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, which was <S%H6213>ordained<s%> in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%>, a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> there shall be the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>: in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place shall you cause the strong <S%H7941>wine<s%> to be <S%H5258>poured<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for a drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>.

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%>: as the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and as the drink <S%H5262>offering<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>, you shall offer <S%H801>it<s%>, a sacrifice made by fire, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the drink offering <S%H5262>there<s%>:
This is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%>, beside the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and his drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>.

And in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>spot<s%>;

And <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>; and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6241>tenth<s%> deals of <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>;

And a several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> for a food <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>; for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%>, a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> unto a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and the <S%H7992>third<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> unto a <S%H352>ram<s%>, and a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of an <S%H1969>hin<s%> unto a <S%H3532>lamb<s%>: this is the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of every <S%H2320>month<s%> throughout the <S%H2320>months<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%>, beside the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and his drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>.
And in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H6453>passover<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>feast<s%>: <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no manner of <S%H5656>servile<s%> work in <S%H4399>it<s%>:

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>: they shall be unto you without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>:

And their food <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>: <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> for a <S%H352>ram<s%>;
A several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> shall you <S%H6213>offer<s%> for <S%H259>every<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>:
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, to make an atonement for <S%H3722>you<s%>.
You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> these beside the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, which is for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>.

After this manner you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%>, throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the sacrifice made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: it shall be <S%H6213>offered<s%> beside the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and his drink <S%H5262>offering<s%>.
And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall have an <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%>, when you <S%H7126>bring<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> food <S%H4503>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, after your <S%H7620>weeks<s%> be <S%H6944>out<s%>, you shall have an holy <S%H4744>convocation<s%>; you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> no <S%H5656>servile<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>:

But you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>smell<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%>, <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>, <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>;

And their food <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mingled<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> tenth <S%H6241>deals<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%>,
A several tenth <S%H6241>deal<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%>, throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>;
And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%>, to make an atonement for <S%H3722>you<s%>.

You shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> them beside the <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, and his food <S%H4503>offering<s%>, (they shall be unto you outside <S%H8549>blemish<s%>) and their drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%>.
